mapper.select: SELECT t.id, concat(t.rent_year, '年', t.rent_month, '月') AS rentMonth, t.must_charge, t.actual_charge, t.arrears, CASE t.is_enable WHEN 1 THEN '正常' WHEN 2 THEN '未启用(合同未审核)' WHEN 3 THEN '合同取消' END AS rentStatus FROM money_rent_must t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.fk_deal_id = #{id}

SELECT datediff(max(t.rent_date), date(#{date})) * (t2.real_rent_charge / 30) FROM money_rent_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t1.id = t.fk_deal_id LEFT JOIN house_resource t2 ON t1.id = t2.id WHERE t1.id = #{id} AND t.is_enable = 1

SELECT t1.deal_serial, t1.deal_name,
group_concat(concat(t5.name, t3.park, t3.build_no, '号楼', t3.build_level, '层', t3.build_room) SEPARATOR ',') AS resourceName, t4.name AS renter, date_format(date(t.rent_date), '%Y年%m月') AS rentMonth, t.must_charge, to_days(t.rent_date) - to_days(now()) AS lastDay FROM money_rent_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t2 ON t2.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t3 ON t2.fk_house_resource_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN renter t4 ON t1.fk_renter_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t5 ON t3.fk_agency_id = t5.id WHERE DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY) >= t.rent_date AND t.is_enable = 1 GROUP BY t.id

SELECT * FROM (SELECT group_concat( CONCAT(t5.name, t4.park, ifnull(t4.build_no, '/'), '栋', ifnull(t4.build_level, '/'), '层', ifnull(t4.build_room, '')) SEPARATOR ',') AS houseLocation, t5.name AS agency, t6.name AS renter, t.id AS payId, date(t1.start_time) AS date, concat('合同保证金') AS reason, t.deposit AS money, sum(t7.money) AS receivedMoney FROM money_deposit_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t3 ON t3.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t4 ON t3.fk_house_resource_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t5 ON t4.fk_agency_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN renter t6 ON t1.fk_renter_id = t6.id LEFT JOIN money_real_flow t7 ON t7.fk_must_money_id = t.id WHERE t1.deal_review_status = 2 AND date_format(t1.start_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{cd.date}, '%Y-%m') GROUP BY t.id
UNION ALL SELECT group_concat( CONCAT(t5.name, t4.park, ifnull(t4.build_no, '/'), '栋', ifnull(t4.build_level, '/'), '层', ifnull(t4.build_room, '')) SEPARATOR ',') AS houseLocation, t5.name AS agency, t6.name AS renter, t.id AS payId, date(t.rent_date) AS date, concat(date(t.rent_date), '应收', date(t.rent_date) ,' ~ ' ,date_add(t.rent_date, INTERVAL t1.pay_type MONTH), '租金') AS reason, t.must_charge AS money, sum(t7.money) AS receivedMoney FROM money_rent_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t3 ON t3.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t4 ON t3.fk_house_resource_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t5 ON t4.fk_agency_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN renter t6 ON t1.fk_renter_id = t6.id LEFT JOIN money_real_flow t7 ON t7.fk_must_money_id = t.id WHERE t1.deal_review_status = 2 AND date_format(t.rent_date, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{cd.date}, '%Y-%m') GROUP BY t.id
UNION ALL SELECT group_concat( CONCAT(t5.name, t4.park, ifnull(t4.build_no, '/'), '栋', ifnull(t4.build_level, '/'), '层', ifnull(t4.build_room, '')) SEPARATOR ',') AS houseLocation, t5.name AS agency, t6.name AS renter, t.id AS payId, date(now()) AS date, concat(year(now()), '-前往年欠款') AS reason, t.arrears AS money, sum(t7.money) AS receivedMoney FROM money_arrears_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t3 ON t3.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t4 ON t3.fk_house_resource_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t5 ON t4.fk_agency_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN renter t6 ON t1.fk_renter_id = t6.id LEFT JOIN money_real_flow t7 ON t7.fk_must_money_id = t.id WHERE t1.deal_review_status = 2 AND year(now()) = year(#{cd.date}) GROUP BY t.id) a WHERE a.houseLocation IS NOT NULL
